H0.text: who wrote when a man loves a woman. Calvin Lewis

H1.text: who wrote when a man loves a woman. Wilson Pickett

H2.text: who wrote when a man loves a woman. Otis Redding

H3.text: who wrote when a man loves a woman. Percy Sledge

A4.text: When a Man Loves a Woman was written by Calvin Lewis and Andrew Wright.

A5.text: Percy Sledge said that he allowed Lewis and Wright to take the writing credits because they gave him the opportunity 'to sing his heart out'.
